canDouble() - Method in class blackjack.Hand
Checks if the hand has two cards and if the value of the hand is 9, 10 or 11.

checkInputs(double, double, double, int, double, boolean) - Method in class blackjack.GameType

cleanDealerHand() - Method in class blackjack.Dealer
Adds the cards from dealer's hand to the junk, and then empties the elements from his hand.
cleanPlayerHands(Player) - Method in class blackjack.Dealer
Receives as input a Player, than removes all hands and bets of an index greater than 0 from the respective lists hands and bet, and leaves the first hand of the list.
